name: haar-visualizer
description: Visualizing Haar cascades used for facial recognition in OpenCV

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; cp -r data dist/data; node html.js > dist/index.html; browserify index.js | uglifyjs -m > dist/bundle.js; uglifycss styles.css > dist/styles.css
scripts.publish: npm run build; gh-pages -d dist; npm run clean

author: Andy Dayton <amdayton@gmail.com> (http://andydayton.com/)
